alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 16 at 4:47AM EDT until October 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow is expected to result in hazardous winter driving conditions for the Monday morning commute. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches expected with locally higher amounts exceeding 10 inches possible along high elevation ridges. Northwest winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Ontonagon, Gogebic and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. Gusty winds and wet snow could bring down tree branches, resulting in sporadic power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Since this is the first winter storm of the season, extra caution is urged for those who must travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
